author: Simon Difford
description: This cocktail delivers pretty much what it says on the tin – chocolate, rum and raisin. Best enjoyed after dinner with deluxe similarly flavoured chocolate.
name: Chocolate, Rum & Raisin
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Dark crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
